Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.data

Class ExtraDepData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.data.PlayerData
it.polimi.ingsw.view.data.ExtraDepData
public class ExtraDepData
extends PlayerData
It's the player with the ClientExtraDep ClientLeaderCard (it extends PlayerData).

    java.util.ArrayList<MappedResource> createMappedRes​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> res)
    When the player has to use some resources, these are received as parameter and, for each of them, the method search where the player has it, looking in all his deposits; finally he returns an ArrayList of MappedResource containing all the resources needed and their location so the player can choose which ones to use.

    • handleWarehouse

      public java.util.ArrayList<MarketResource> handleWarehouse​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> res)
      Description copied from class: PlayerData
      Called when the player takes resources from market.

      First of all the obtained resources are filtered by the Faith points and by the white marbles, if the player is a ChangeResData these ones are changed. Then asks to the player in which levels he wants to put every resource or even he wants to discard some of them, if there is no space the resource are automatically discarded. Finally returns an ArrayList containing the resources and their destination in the WareHouse, or in an extra deposit if the player is an ExtraDepData.

      Overrides:
      handleWarehouse in class PlayerData
      Parameters:
      res - the resources gained from the market.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of MarketResources.

    • switchLevels

      public int switchLevels​(int origin)
      Description copied from class: PlayerData
      Used when the player wants to sort resources in his warehouse. It received the origin level from where the player wants to start to move resources, shows to the player all the possible deposits in which can move those resources and make him choose one of them. Finally return the number of the chosen level. If the player is an ExtraDepData even the extra deposits are consider.
      Overrides:
      switchLevels in class PlayerData
      Parameters:
      origin - the level from where the player wants to move resources.
      Returns:
      the chosen level by the player to where puts the resources.

    • getDeposits

      public java.util.ArrayList<Resource[]> getDeposits()
      Description copied from class: PlayerData
      Gets all the deposits in which the player can puts resources takes from the market; if the player is an ExtraDepData considers even the extra deposits.
      Overrides:
      getDeposits in class PlayerData
      Returns:
      all the players' deposits.

    • createMappedRes

      public java.util.ArrayList<MappedResource> createMappedRes​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> res)
      Description copied from class: PlayerData
      When the player has to use some resources, these are received as parameter and, for each of them, the method search where the player has it, looking in all his deposits; finally he returns an ArrayList of MappedResource containing all the resources needed and their location so the player can choose which ones to use.
      Overrides:
      createMappedRes in class PlayerData
      Parameters:
      res - the resources needed to buy a development card or to produce.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of MappedResources.
